entry.title: Eclipse Chasers Travel Far and Pack Traditions: Orange Pants and Dinky Doo
entry.content: Devoted followers of total solar eclipses often have their own special rituals for the event, from wearing special outfits to making egg creams. Now they’re gearing up for the next one, over Antarctica.

entry.title: Afghan Teachers Defy Taliban by Secretly Schooling Teenage Girls
entry.content: Three months after the Taliban seized control of Afghanistan, girls haven’t been allowed in public school beyond sixth grade in Kabul and other cities.
